mapper.insert: insert into archive_exam (id,paper_id,name,description,begin_time,end_time,score,teacher_id,kp_code,create_time, version,update_time,creator,updater,deleted,place,time_limit,class_id,problem_num) select id,paper_id,name,description,begin_time,end_time,score,teacher_id,kp_code,create_time, version,update_time,creator,updater,deleted,place,time_limit,class_id,problem_num from exam where create_time between date_sub(now(),interval 1 day) and now()
